lessons.japanese: ああ！ もし私がお金持ちだったら、スペインに家を買うのに。
lessons.indonesian: Ah! If I were rich, I'd buy myself a house in Spain.

lessons.japanese: 暇だったら、手伝ってください。

lessons.japanese: 君の立場だったら、私も同じ事をするだろう。
lessons.indonesian: If I were in your situation, I would do the same thing.

lessons.japanese: 君の年齢だったら、私もそう考えるだろうね。
lessons.indonesian: At your age, I would think so, too.

lessons.japanese: 君が僕の立場だったら、どうするかね。

lessons.japanese: お金持ちだったらなあ。
局地的な大雨だったらしいけど、行かなくて正解だったよ。
lessons.indonesian: I'm glad we didn't go there because there were some localized heavy rain showers.

lessons.japanese: もし私があなただったら、家に帰ってゆっくり休むのに。
lessons.indonesian: If I were you, I would go home and take a good rest.
